ai-tha-ap50:1.4_0: I am walking mindfully in the shade of the path,
ai-tha-ap50:2.3_0: I am the one with my hands,
ai-tha-ap50:4.1_0: ‘Through this offering may I give gifts to the monks
ai-tha-ap50:5.2_0: you’ll make the gods in the order of gods.
ai-tha-ap50:6.1_0: you’ve gone to the human realm.
ai-tha-ap50:6.2_0: will be the kingdom of kings.”
ai-tha-ap50:6.3_0: Triumps three times, and three times,
ai-tha-ap50:6.4_0: there will be a great one,’
ai-tha-ap50:7.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap50:7.4_0: This is the path to the fruit.
ai-tha-ap50:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Mahākappina.
